oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of composite milk samples for diagnosis of Staphylococcus aureus mastitis in dairy cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lam, T. J. G. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: composite milk samples
Staphylococcus aureus
intramammary infection
gland samples
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reliability of use of composite milk samples for diagnosis of intramammary Staphylococcus aureus infections in dairy cattle was compared with that of individual gland samples. Full article published in Journal American Veterinary Medical Association (1996); 208, 1705-1708
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 32
